title: NEW PIRELLI LOGO TO IDENTIFY TYRES WITH AT LEAST 50% SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS - Newsroom Pirelli

title: Honda East Liberty Auto Plant Earns E3 Platinum Achievement Award from Ohio EPA - Honda Newsroom
summary: Honda's East Liberty Auto Plant received the Ohio EPA's E3 platinum award for its commitment to sustainability, recycling scrap materials, and reducing environmental impact. The plant implements innovative practices like algae removal technology and hosts environmental fairs to reduce emissions, conserve water, minimize waste, and promote eco-friendly manufacturing processes.
